'''Drawings by Tolkien''' can refer to:
* '''[[Drawings by Tolkien (exhibition catalogue)]]''', a [[1976]] catalog from a [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] exhibition in the 1970's.
* '''''[[Pictures by J.R.R. Tolkien]]''''', a [[1979]] book by [[Christopher Tolkien]] on his father's artwork.
* '''[[:Category:Images by J.R.R. Tolkien|Images by J.R.R. Tolkien]]''', a gallery of illustrations by J.R.R. Tolkien.
